description: Manage, browse, and import agent skills locally. Supports Claude, Cursor, Codex and more.
viewsContainer.title: Skill Dock
view.library.name: Skill Library

config.libraryPath.description: Custom path for the skill library. Defaults to ~/.skilldock/skills

config.showRepoSkills.description: Show the Repo Skills panel in the sidebar
